PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12252023-12-08ESDC
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectOrder Approving the Terms and Conditions in Direct and Risk-shared Student Loan Agreements
PrecisOrder approving the revision of terms and conditions of the Master Student Financial Assistance Agreement in order to reflect the permanent elimination of interest accrual on Canada Student Loans as of April 1, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the revision of terms and conditions of the Master Student Financial Assistance Agreement in order to reflect the permanent elimination of interest accrual on Canada Student Loans as of April 1, 2023.
